acceptance_criteria: All entity types have proper field transformations
subtasks.notes:
Reviewed and updated migrate-sqlite-to-postgres.ts for new PostgreSQL component-based schema. Fixed critical field mapping issues:

✅ Agent transformation - Updated to use toolConfig and modelConfig components
✅ Skill transformation - Fixed field names (content→skillmd, added displayName)
✅ Task transformation - Fixed field names (errorMessage→error, durationMs→executionTime)
✅ Relations migration - Updated for skillSelection and mcpConfig component arrays

Created comprehensive migration-script-review.md documenting all issues and fixes. All acceptance criteria met:
✅ All entity types have proper field transformations
✅ Relations correctly migrated with component-based approach
✅ Robust error handling in place

Script now ready for testing with --validate-only flag.

Spot-checks sample records for data accuracy
subtasks.notes: Enhanced scripts/validate-migration.ts for post-migration validation. Updated for component-based schema (modelConfig, toolConfig, skillSelection, mcpConfig). Added row count validation between SQLite and PostgreSQL. Implemented sample data spot-checking for agents, skills, and MCP servers with field-level accuracy checks. Enhanced reporting with detailed validation results and clear pass/fail/warning status. All acceptance criteria met: ✅ Validates row counts match, ✅ Spot-checks sample records, ✅ Reports discrepancies clearly.

subtasks.title: Test rollback procedure
subtasks.description: Verify rollback script can restore from backup if migration fails
acceptance_criteria: Rollback restores database to pre-migration state
subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive PostgreSQL rollback verification system. Implemented test script (test-rollback-procedure.ts) for automated rollback testing with dry-run mode. Created complete documentation (POSTGRES_ROLLBACK_PROCEDURES.md) with step-by-step procedures, common scenarios, troubleshooting guide, and security best practices. Enhanced backup directory README with comprehensive backup/restore instructions. Added npm run test:rollback script. Made backup-postgres.sh executable. All acceptance criteria met: ✅ Backup created before migration (backup-postgres.sh), ✅ Rollback restores database to pre-migration state (documented and tested), ✅ Documentation includes rollback steps (comprehensive guide created).

subtasks.title: Audit all SQLite references in codebase
subtasks.description: Search and document all files containing SQLite references that need attention
acceptance_criteria: Complete list of files with SQLite references
Each reference categorized as: remove, deprecate, or keep for migration
subtasks.notes:
Completed comprehensive SQLite reference audit. Created sqlite-audit.md documenting all 42 files with SQLite references. Categorized each file as:
- KEEP (Migration Tools): 8 files - migration scripts to be moved to scripts/migration-tools/
- KEEP (Active Features): 2 files - session-info-service.ts and web-push-service.ts use SQLite for local storage (NOT part of PostgreSQL migration)
- DEPRECATE: 4 files - database.ts, READMEs need updated deprecation warnings
- REMOVE/UPDATE: 2 files - package.json dependencies to evaluate
- DOCUMENTATION ONLY: 26 files - no action needed

Key findings:
✅ Distinguished local storage features (session/web-push) from Strapi database migration
✅ Identified all migration scripts for organization in subtask 3.3
✅ Provided clear action items for remaining Phase 3 subtasks
✅ Verified .gitignore already properly configured for SQLite files

All acceptance criteria met:
✅ Complete list of files with SQLite references (42 files documented)
✅ Each reference categorized with clear action recommendations
